title: Complete JavaScript Course
description: Master JavaScript from basics to advanced concepts including ES6, async programming, and more. This comprehensive course takes you from a complete beginner to an advanced JavaScript developer.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Learn Python programming for data analysis, visualization, and machine learning. This course covers NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn libraries.

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Protect networks and systems from cyber threats with this comprehensive course. Learn about network security, encryption, firewalls, and intrusion detection systems.

title: UI/UX Design Masterclass
description: Learn design principles, user research, and prototyping to create beautiful interfaces. This course covers the entire design process from ideation to implementation.

title: React Frontend Development
description: Build modern web applications with React, Redux, and related libraries. Learn component-based architecture, state management, and routing.

title: Machine Learning with Python
description: Dive into machine learning algorithms and build predictive models with Python. This course covers supervised and unsupervised learning techniques.
